title: The Quotients Under the Ocean
description: The Quotients Under the Ocean is an illustrative children's book which aims to help teach young readers the basics of division through rhymes and pictures. Read and follow along with four colorful fish friends as they play their favorite math game! During their under water adventure your early learner will help our fish friends find the quotients under the ocean, and learn new math concepts, like Divisors and Dividends!
author: Leigh Ann Sajous
